terrastorage.button.tooltip.loot_all: Loot all the items from the storage to your inventory.
terrastorage.button.tooltip.deposit_all: Deposit all the items from your inventory to the storage.
Transfer items from your inventory to the storage, stacking with existing items and creating new stacks for matching items.
Transfer items from your inventory to the storage if they can stack with existing items.
terrastorage.button.tooltip.restock: Transfer items from the storage to your inventory if they can stack with existing items.
terrastorage.button.tooltip.sort_items: Sort the items in this storage.
terrastorage.button.tooltip.reset: Entering an empty name will reset the name of the storage to its default name.
terrastorage.button.tooltip.options: Configure Terrastorage, you can disable this button in the options screen.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.display_opti: Whether to display the options button in the storage inventory screens.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.hotbar_prote: Whether to protect hotbar items from storage options.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.sort_type: The property by which items will be sorted.
terrastorage.message.client_saving_error: Saving failed, please check and validate your client configuration file, the info related to this error was outputted to this session's log file.
terrastorage.message.server_saving_error: Saving failed, please check and validate your server configuration file, the info related to this error was outputted to this session's log/console.
terrastorage.message.unsupported_packet: Couldn't send packet, please ensure Terrastorage is installed on the server side.
terrastorage.message.packet_cooldown: This action is on cooldown, please wait a bit before trying again.
terrastorage.message.restricted_inventor: This inventory appears to be restricted, storage options cannot be used on it.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.button_width: Width adjustment is disabled for text-only buttons.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.reset_to_def: Reset the buttons to their original state.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.save_and_exi: Save the changes you made and exit the customization screen.
terrastorage.option.tooltip.storage_quic:
The quick stacking mode used when quick stacking into a single storage.

Smart Deposit: Like Fill Up, but also moves all matching items into empty slots, creating new stacks as needed

Fill Up: Adds items to existing stacks until they reach their maximum capacity
terrastorage.option.tooltip.nearby_quick:
The quick stacking mode used when quick stacking to nearby storages.

Smart Deposit: Like Fill Up, but also moves all matching items into empty slots, creating new stacks as needed

Fill Up: Adds items to existing stacks until they reach their maximum capacity
